about-me.title: About me
about-me.subtitle: Check informations about me.
about-me.description: I have experience in web development, operating both in the planning, development and deployment of applications.    I use some of the best practices, such as Design Patterns, Architectural patterns, Clean Code, SOLID, etc... I've been a developer since 2017 and I've been working with web in agile teams using SCRUM and KAMBAM for over 3 years.I am easy to communicate with and very excited about new projects and technologies.
about-me.formations-content:
*ELECTRONIC ENGINEERING - 2018-2025
IFSC Florianópolis

*Typescript Training: Typescript Part I, II and III.

*Javascript:
     JavaScript: programming Object Orientation.

     JavaScript: interfaces and Inheritance in Orientation Objects.

*React:
     React: testing your components.
     React: global State Management with Redux.

*NestJS: creating a Rest API with TypeScript.

*Design System: creating components and documenting.

*Design System: designing elements.

*HTTP: Understanding the web under the hood.
about-me.experiences-content:
FRONT-END DEVELOPER - APRIL/2023 – August/2023
Grimpatech Ltda – FOZ DO IGUAÇU/PR/Brazil
I worked on three projects a website using ReactJS,
an application using React Native and a backend using Express.
Kamban and toggle were used for time management.

FRONT-END DEVELOPER - NOVEMBER/2022 - FEBRUARY/2023
AGROTIS– CURITIBA/PR/Brazil
ReactJS was used on the front-end with a joint implementation 
of contextAPI and Redux and Next.    Management with Jenkins 
and Docker, Kambam and Clockfy.

FRONT-END DEVELOPER - JANUARY/2023 – APRIL/2023
Sou Digital– Florianópolis/SC/Brazil
Development of automations for websites and also participated 
in the integration of local data management using Redux with
Saga.    Architecture and implementation of addons for Google 
chrome in pure JQuery and Javascript. In addition to mobile apps 
using ReactNative.

FULL-STACK DEVELOPER - AUGUST/2022 - OCTOBER/2022
WEFF – SÃO PAULO/SP/Brazil
Using React(TS), next, jest and material UI on the front, using 
company's own git flow techniques in addition to 'pixel perfect' 
request, clean and tested code. Design system, clean code rules 
were default, organization through kambam(trello).

FULL-STACK TECH LEADER - APRIL/2022 - JUNE/2022
JVM WEBMARKETING- Florianópolis/SC/Brazil
Development of a web application using ReactJS(TS), Next, 
Material UI on the front-end and Nest(express) on the back-end.
Design patterns, SOLID methodology, SCRUM and Kamban (kamabamX)
were used.

FRONT-END DEVELOPER - JANUARY/2022 - APRIL/2022
WEDEV GROUP – Balneário Camboriu/SC/Brazil
One of the biggest company that I worked have a high code level, 
I worked in ReactJS applications with chakra UI, YUP, using
methodologies such as SOLID, Kamban(trello), and clockfy.

FRONT-END DEVELOPER – NOVEMBER / 2021 - MARCH 2022
LUMINOS – Curitiba/PR/Brazil
Development of web applications using React with Redux and SCSS.
I used Object-oriented programming and methods such as SCRUM
and Kamban.

DESENVOLVEDOR WEB - JUNE/2021 - NOVEMBER/2021
FREELANCER – Florianópolis/SC/Brazil
I served several companies using PHP and ReactJs, developing 
landing pages, doing marketing on google and hosting websites.
   Having some of these jobs saved on my github.

FRONT-END DEVELOPER – FEBRUARY/2021 - JUNE/2021
INDIEWITCH – Curitiba/PR
Website development using ReactJS with NextJS.
Simple architecture and design by Figma.
